pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genetic Association Analysis // It gathers information, meta-data and scripts in a two-part Henry-Stewart talk by Zhao (2009, doi:10.69645/DCRY5578), which showcases analysis in aspects such as testing of polymorphic variant(s) for Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium, association with trait using genetic and statistical models as well as Bayesian implementation, power calculation in study design and genetic annotation. It also covers R integration with the Linux environment, GitHub, package creation and web applications.
